Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.socket

Class SocketServerGameUpdater

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.socket.SocketServerGameUpdater
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameUpdater
public class SocketServerGameUpdater extends Object implements GameUpdater
Socket GameUpdater implementation which forwards requests to the client using packets
